pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, August 28, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Longueuil, Quebec 

1:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with le Cercle des présidents du Québec and will deliver brief remarks.

1225, rue Saint-Charles Ouest

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage for remarks at the beginning of the meeting
    • Media should arrive in the main lobby no later than 12:15 p.m.

Montréal, Quebec 

2:45 p.m. The Prime Minister with meet with the Papineau Youth Council.

1100, boulevard Crémazie Est

Notes for media:

    • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
    • Media should arrive in the main lobby no later than 2:15 p.m.
